    Demo Introduction

    This guide will help you prepare and run the Cloud Integration for Salesforce Demo.

    If you have not used Bluedemos System before, please start with Step 0 to create an IBM ID.

    If you already have an IBM ID that has access to Bluedemos, you can proceed directly to step Step 1.
